column4: Is anyone having trouble with Rhythmbox? for some reason my keeps freezing when it changes to a different song on a playlist or when I listen to one song and then manually start to play another
where are these songs located ? on your local disk ?
try reloading the library... sometimes it happened to me when i had songs from windows partition folder and it wasn't mounted... though im not sure that this is the case
how do I reload the list?
try music ---> import folder,   try importing your music folder again
np, there is a good player called "listen" too, which is like rhythmbox style
hye do you know if I can change the skin on rhythmbox, I don't mean through the theme manager
seems there aren't in the repos
No I don't it's helping, I even removed it completely and then re-installed it.
no it loads, but I meant that it is not working
what plugins did you install ? what files are you trying to play ? mp3s ?
mm this is weird, you wanna check out this for plugins though:
